mapper.select: SELECT ORDERT.ORD_PRN, ORDERT.ORD_CODE, PRODUCT.PROD_CODE, ORDERT.ORD_DATE, CORP.CORP_NAME, PRODUCT.PROD_NAME, ORDERT.ORD_NAP, PRODUCT.PROD_NO, PRODUCT.PROD_GYU, PRODUCT.PROD_JAI, PRODUCT.PROD_PG + ' ' + PRODUCT.PROD_PG1 + '~' + PRODUCT.PROD_PG2 AS prod_pg, PRODUCT.PROD_SG + ' ' + PRODUCT.PROD_SG1 + '~' + PRODUCT.PROD_SG2 AS Prod_sg, PRODUCT.PROD_GD4 + '~' + PRODUCT.PROD_GD5 AS Prod_cd, PRODUCT.PROD_E1, TECHIN.TECH_TE, ORDERT.ORD_LOT, ORDERT.ORD_GYU, ROUND(ORD_AMNT,2) AS ORD_AMNT, ORD_DANG, ORDERT.ORD_MON, ORDERT.ORD_DANW, ROUND(ORDERT.ORD_SU, 1) as ORD_SU, ORDERT.ORD_SUNIP, case when ORD_CHULHACHECK ='true' then '출고' else '미출고' END AS ORD_CHULHACHECK, ORDERT.ORD_DANJ, ORDERT.ORD_BIGO, ORDERT.ORD_NAME, CASE WHEN [ORDERT].[ORD_T02] = '1' THEN 'O' ELSE 'X' END AS ORD_T02, CASE WHEN [ORDERT].[ORD_T01] = '1' THEN 'O' ELSE 'X' END AS ORD_T01, ORDERT.ORD_BOXSU, IPTEST.ITST_WP FROM ORDERT INNER JOIN PRODUCT ON ORDERT.PROD_CODE = PRODUCT.PROD_CODE INNER JOIN CORP ON PRODUCT.CORP_CODE = CORP.CORP_CODE INNER JOIN IPTEST ON ORDERT.ORD_CODE = IPTEST.ORD_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN TECHIN ON PRODUCT.TECH_NO = TECHIN.TECH_NO WHERE CONVERT(CHAR(19),ORDERT.ORD_DATE,120) BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY ORD_DATE,CORP_NAME,PROD_NAME,PROD_NO) AS ROW_NUM ,LEFT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR, ORD_DATE, 120), 10) as ORD_DATE, dbo.CORP.CORP_NAME, dbo.PRODUCT.PROD_NAME, dbo.PRODUCT.PROD_NO, SUM(dbo.ORDERT.ORD_SU) AS Su, ROUND(SUM(dbo.ORDERT.ORD_MON),2) AS Mon, str(PRODUCT.PROD_DANG,16,1) as PROD_DANG FROM dbo.ORDERT INNER JOIN dbo.PRODUCT ON dbo.ORDERT.PROD_CODE = dbo.PRODUCT.PROD_CODE INNER JOIN dbo.CORP ON dbo.PRODUCT.CORP_CODE = dbo.CORP.CORP_CODE WHERE dbo.ORDERT.ORD_DATE between #{sdate} and #{edate} GROUP BY dbo.ORDERT.ORD_DATE, dbo.CORP.CORP_NAME, dbo.PRODUCT.PROD_NAME, dbo.PRODUCT.PROD_NO,dbo.product.prod_dang

SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY ORD_DATE,CORP_NAME) AS ROW_NUM, LEFT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR, ORD_DATE, 120), 10) as ORD_DATE,dbo.CORP.CORP_NAME, SUM(dbo.ORDERT.ORD_MON) AS Mon FROM dbo.ORDERT INNER JOIN dbo.PRODUCT ON dbo.ORDERT.PROD_CODE = dbo.PRODUCT.PROD_CODE INNER JOIN dbo.CORP ON dbo.PRODUCT.CORP_CODE = dbo.CORP.CORP_CODE where dbo.ORDERT.ORD_DATE between #{sdate} and #{edate} GROUP BY dbo.ORDERT.ORD_DATE, dbo.CORP.CORP_NAME

SELECT PRODUCT.PROD_CODE, CORP.CORP_NAME, PRODUCT.PROD_NAME, PRODUCT.PROD_NO, PRODUCT.PROD_GYU, PRODUCT.PROD_JAI, TECHIN.TECH_TE, CONCAT(PRODUCT.PROD_PG,' ',PRODUCT.PROD_PG1,'~',PRODUCT.PROD_PG2) AS Prod_PG, CONCAT(PRODUCT.PROD_SG,' ',PRODUCT.PROD_SG1,'~',PRODUCT.PROD_SG2) AS Prod_SG, CONCAT(PRODUCT.PROD_GD4,'~',PRODUCT.PROD_GD5) AS Prod_Cd, PRODUCT.PROD_GUBN, PRODUCT.PROD_E1, PRODUCT.PROD_E3, PRODUCT.PROD_DANW, PRODUCT.PROD_DANJ, PRODUCT.PROD_DANG, PRODUCT.PROD_CNO, PRODUCT.PROD_GD1, PRODUCT.PROD_GD2, PRODUCT.PROD_GD3, PRODUCT.PROD_BOXSU FROM PRODUCT INNER JOIN CORP ON PRODUCT.CORP_CODE = CORP.CORP_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN TECHIN ON PRODUCT.TECH_NO = TECHIN.TECH_NO
